Hagee is a demogogue.
 
 He and other's who push their end times messages have a nacking habit of changing the details to suit current events...pimping the same regurgitated message for profit.
 
 One of my main interersts is in apocalyptic fiction. Any book, movie, media source on this subject, fictional of based on scientific study...I probably own or have viewed.
 
 In the 80's, I'd watch these types of panderers speak about how Gog/ Magog was Russia, The USSR and how WWIII would usher in the end times with the proverbial war at the valley of Har Megido (armageddon). Often, this would be over oil issues or the religious strife there...what ever was making headlines that day.
 When the USSR collapsed, they turned to China briefly seeking to find the boogy man there. Pulling out charts and graphs and maps to outline 'how it will happen'.
 Shortly thereafter, Saddam and GW1 grabbed their interest as the next anti-Christ and conflict in the Mideast was finally here.
 When that war snuffed out too early, the demagogues went back and grasped as what ever straw they could find. Seeing in Clinton and Y2K an opprotunity to say the NWO was being formed and Christian identity groups (often racist oriented militias) were being persecuted in the US.
 Y2K and the resultant nuclear holocaust that it would cause with Russian and Chinese nukes also failed to materialize.
 Then 9/11 hit and we're back in the Middle East. 
 
 All this along with shifting dates for the events to happen...puts these pimps right in league with other doom-sayers like the J.W's who's predictions of the end times never happened.
 
 Key points in the time line are to be:
 50th Anniversary of the return to Israel (as a nation-state), Already happened.
 Unified world Gov't (some allege it's the UN...or permutation of EU...LOL) 
 7 years of really bad times of tribulation. With either a pre-rapture, mid-point rapture or post trib-rapture of All loyal followers along with the 'innocent' to include young children.
 Plus a host of other 'signs and portents' that, if you carefully review human history have HAPPENED EVERY YEAR IT'S BEEN RECORDED.
 
 As for the vague promises in Genesis of God to the children of Abraham, it's odd how some take that to mean a perpetual nation state or still applying it to those whom God later punishes.
 I even hear the pimps push that gentiles are the children of Abraham and are entitled to the blessings. They make this claim via the messages of Paul in the NT.
 
 In the end, I find it interesting how RUSSIA is depicted as Gog / Magog.
 Rev: 20:7-8
 When the thousand years are over, Satan will be released from his prison and will go out to deceive the nations in the four corners of the earth-Gog and Magog-to gather them for battle. In number they are like the sand on the seashore.
 
 Gog and Magog.
 
 I need remind you that in this little part of Rev., the end times that are expected soon have been over for 1000 years! J.C. has been ruling Earth too.
 Logic problems anyone?
 
 
 As for the reasons (beyond financial) that some support a Jewish state...they don't care about the Jews but see them as a tool to bring about the end times so that JC can return.
 Rather than allow God to work out His own plan at his leisure as a SOVERIGN Lord, this breed of Evangelicals actually see themselves as an important and active element and that unless they do something themselves, God won't.
 It's part of the abberant Word of Faith Theology that Hagee is a part of.
 The notion that God can't do anything without permission from Man...who has godly powers also.
 Like the sick anti-social survivalist nut, they long for the day when their enemies are punished and they are rewarded.
 The silly thing is, pres. Bush's evangelical belief system also embraces these attitudes. He is doing 'Gods work' after all. Likes most followers of this movement, many want to play an active role, be a big-dawg playa...that's why many people jump on this band wagon and support these types.
 
 Prior to 9/11 I visited a Methodist church where there was a Sunday-school service on the evils of Muslims. Basic ignorance where they were depicted as boogy men and the Black Muslim of Louis F. was used as a template for all of Islam from Sunni to Shiite to Sufi. The master plan of the Anti-Christ was to get people to renounce their faith and accept the mark. They'd toss on the use of torture as a means, then self congratulate themselves over how they'd resist and 'keep the faith'.
 
 I pointed out that in the bible, it's acceptable to renounce your faith in word (probably not heart) under similar circumstances and that God would know your heart.
 
 They mocked with the 'That's not in MY bible' attitude.
 
 I had to point out that Peter denied the Christ 3 times on the night of his arrest...despite his boasts to stand fast to the end just hours previously.
 If God can forgive him and go on to build a faith system with Peter being a key player in it, then I think God can understand how weak flesh can give in or the fears of watching your children suffer.
 
 I really wish most Christians would read and seek to understand their own bible.
